website_summaries.verdict: Attractive midrange alternative to higher end bento boxes. Solid construction similar to Tupperware, including the helpful "burp" feature.
cons: Elastic strap can stretch out over time

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Like the design. Bit smaller. Bit hard to open if you don't want to spill liquids
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture. Only the size it might look big but is actually smaller. I don't mind the size since I didn't want something big. When opening you might spill liquids even pulling the clear rubber to let out air is still hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So in love with my bento! I was concerned about the size but it's perfect, I was able to serve myself the usual amount I serve myself on an average plate. Completely satisfied with the quality and size 😊
customer_reviews.author: KITTY

customer_reviews.title: Leak-proof?  Try again
customer_reviews.text: So, don't get me wrong. I like this bento box. Leak proof though? Sadly, I found out the hard way that this is not an accurate statement, on two occasions, when I found yogurt in my back on day, and cottage cheese on another. I've checked the seal to make sure I put the lid on tight, the ventilation is closed, and that the silicon seal is on correctly. It just isn't leak-proof. If you take that feature out, it's a good bent. It compact, the cutlery is ok, and works well in the microwave and dishwasher. Sadly though, for my purposes, I'll have to find something else, and I do need something that is truly "leak-proof"
customer_reviews.author: Beau Miller

customer_reviews.title: is the best of the bunch
customer_reviews.text: I've been through quite a few different styles of bento boxes. This one though, hands down, is the best of the bunch. Each compartment has a vacuum type seal holding the lids down, and doesn't seem to leak at all. The included plastic ware is nice, but is a little small and can be hard to use at times. After several months of use, the band seems to be holding up just fine. Cleanup is easy and so far the plastic has not been "stained" by any foods kept inside.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did the research
customer_reviews.text: I'm not exaggerating when I say that I looked at 50 different bento boxes before I chose this one. The effort was well worth it. Even though it is plastic, it still has a very solid and durable feel to it. I love that it is microwave and dishwasher safe and I'm very pleased with the way it seals and stacks together. The little compartment for the built-in flatware is a nice touch and the included bag allows for the option to bring along additional items that might not fit in the box like a sealed beverage or a large piece of fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Just as I expected very sturdy will ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Just as I expected very sturdy will post about usage afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: High quality, weird size
customer_reviews.text: I love so much about this bento box! It's very high quality, and the seals are outstanding. I love the little included cutlery! Everything is great, except for two things: the sizing is pretty small. I find I can't fit most things I want to bring for lunch, including things that are not large (like, say, strawberries) in the boxes. So I never end up using it because there's no point. It's very easy to clean (I throw it in the dishwasher top rack) EXCEPT one box has a weird bar running across it half a centimeter from the bottom, just high enough to get all kinds of food stuck underneath. Why? What an unfortunate design choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnet A. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: This looks so good in the picture but when I got it I ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks so good in the picture but when I got it I was ashamed to give it as a gift. The person wanted one but she thought it cost about 5 bucks. Very cheap. Priced too high
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T

customer_reviews.title: Packing lunch made to last!
customer_reviews.text: As a college student, I’m on to go between class and work frequently and sometimes don’t have time to sit down for a meal, but also don’t want to be carrying around bulky lunch boxes that leak. This bento box has made packing snacks and small meals so easy. It’s compact enough to fit into my small bag without bulging out and taking up space while keeping my food tightly secured from leaking out. There’s a place to store utensils at the top, it’s microwaveable, dishwasher safe, and looks great. I wish my parents knew about it when I was in grade school.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: Mines Completely leak-proof
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price. Completely leak proof, both lids come with rubber seal and rubber air hole plug. For my review I put water in it and shook it like hell, not one drop of water or leak. comes with a carry/storage bag as well as under top first lid a storage area for utensils,a elastic band that holds the two boxes together and the utensil storage lid closed,one box divider and 2 leak proof lids w/boxes. Feels very well made, just use soft side of your sponge or something soft to wash it because the material scratches easily. But aside from that five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hubert

customer_reviews.title: It's very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: It is good looking and a conversation starter. I'm disturbed that although we are careful not to microwave fatty foods, we still melted it a little in the bottom of the black dishes. I have tried many things to remove these marks, but have been unable to. Now, when the dishes are clean, it looks like we didn't get all of the food off the bottom. When packing a lunch, we avoid using this if we know that a microwave will be required. I don't want to buy something nice like this, then worry about whether it can handle a normal meal experience.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ireland

customer_reviews.title: cheap junk warped plastic.
customer_reviews.text: $24 on a pile of cheap plastic, and it is warped, out of the box. spend your money on something better.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Worth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👌
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little lunch box. Love that it comes with utensils. The chop sticks are textured at the ends so that it's easier to grip food with them. Also love the little bag it comes with, has enough additional room for a yogurt cup or small drink bottle. The plastic the lunch box is made of feels surprisingly durable compared to others I've had. Holds more food than I expected, you just have to be smart about how you pack it! Will update on the leak proof and if the white gets stained by food or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful and cute but poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved it. Bringing lunch to my new job was easy (and cute). Never dealt with anything spilling out and I could microwave it with no problem. However, the silicone band around one of the lids had fallen off. Now the lid will not close onto the box. The lunch box is not usable anymore. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: siana

customer_reviews.title: Nice bento box.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bento box with plenty of room for all your lunch fixin's. It comes with the fork, knife, spoon & chopsticks. Also the carry bag. The only thing is if you want your items separated there are no "compartments" except 1-movable separator (that slips around VERY easily). Just an FYI in case you need to know to buy extra little do-dads for separation.
customer_reviews.author: tessi

customer_reviews.title: Good box cheap utensils
customer_reviews.text: I like this product overall but the utensils are cheap and worthless. I ordered two of these boxes in February and both forks broke after a couple of months. The chop sticks will not grab anything because they are slick plastic. Getting replacement forks has proven to be a challenge because they are smaller and flatter than your average fork due to the space provided in the box. I don’t see a replacement through the company anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: C. I. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BENTO!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bento box for my boyfriend as a gift for valentines day, and he LOVES it! Its a really nice bento box and it came a lot faster than expected. He loves when I pack his lunch in it then he grabs it before he leaves for work. I even bought a bento cookbook so I can make him different things to eat. I pre make the cooked rice and proteins so then packing it is a breeze and takes no time at all. It has also saved us money because now instead oh him grabbing take out it has encouraged us to just pack a lunch!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Standard silicone baking cups are good for separating fruit or crackers from other packed items
customer_reviews.text: (Wife's words)-Bought this one to replace a different, cuter one that developed cracks and leaked. This box is phenomenal. Dishwasher & microwave safe over time. No staining/lingering odors. If I take the included cutlery with me, the elastic band works well to keep it in place and I can generally include a single folded napkin, too. But most days, I just use the cutlery I always keep in my desk. Standard silicone baking cups are good for separating fruit or crackers from other packed items. Would highly recommend for office lunches or for kids to take to school.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D. Kear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Good portion sizes. Lunch and dinner can easily fit if you're on a diet, and if not a good sized meal can fit in both. The chopstick have a gripping texture at the bottom which makes them easy to use. It is very leak proof! I've even put soup in the bottom! It's very very easy to clean, just rinse and wipe. Little to no.scrubbing ever needed even for foods that would normally need it.
customer_reviews.author: EchoFelicis25

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My son loves the bento box. The lids seal well and everything is protected in a compact format. Had it for 2 months now and pleased with the construction. The box should last many years. The strap may not be that durable but so far it's doing the job of holding the boxes together. I should mention that if you only pack 1 box, you can turn the strap lengthwise to hold the cover in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product but it was for my 14 year old son. He got a job landscaping for the summer and said it wasnt practical for him to have a lunch box like this one to just throw on the dash of the work truck. Lol He liked how it had the utensils especially the chopsticks that he loves to use but decided not to keep it. Thank you though. It was a nice find!
customer_reviews.author: K Ritts

customer_reviews.title: A neat spacesaver for a meal on the go
customer_reviews.text: Received it Saturday afternoon and have used it twice already. It is nice to have one unit in my bag instead of 3 or 4 assorted plastic containers and a water bottle floating around in there. I haven't tested whether it is leak proof but the seals look and feel as though they would keep any liquids in. I like having the utensils as part of the kit. Having a designated space for them makes me remember to put them in. I liked this design over some others because one box can be for the microwaveable part of the meal and snacks, such as veggies and fruit can stay cool in the other box.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriends lunches. This is the only bento box that looked adult enough to get him and had good reviews. I got it for him about a year ago and it still works but he works a different shift than he did when I bought it so he doesn’t bring food to work anymore. I wouldn’t trust it with thin liquids but for everything else it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: No free lunch bag, chipped divider after several uses.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a 'best buy' from Amazon and said it came with a free lunch bag. I bought 2 and there were no lunch bags. Also, one of the dividers has already chipped on the side after just a couple of months. The plastic seems to be cheap. My girls like them overall but I was disappointed at the quality and lack of bag.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Great little lunchbox!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this in the hopes that the cuteness will make me pack my lunch more this year. I packed it with something full of liquid and it most definitely was leak-proof
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints. Wood design makes them pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: I started making my own lunch for work. Used this for about 2 weeks. No complaints its pretty nice looking and the rubber air holes are pretty cool to release steam and pressure. I stopped using this because I had to up my calorie intake and the bento boxes are not large enough to hold all my food anymore. I wish i would've purchased the larger containers cuz they are pretty nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: BigTangTheory

customer_reviews.title: Portion controlled Bento you are looking for
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Proper portion size not super size. Lid is a plate all the utensils you need and a bag to put it all in. I do not microwave with lids on. I do not want to mess up seals. And I love the built in vent. It allows a superior seal. I have bout four just for convenience. I make my wife’s and daughter lunch every day then pop there dirty boxes in the dishwasher so I always have two clean. I can even put a drink in the top of bag after bento box is in free lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: greer

customer_reviews.title: It's a Mini-Giant
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bento box! It's small but fierce! It can hold great portions of food. One of my favorite things is that I can keep things to warm in the microwave at work in one box and others to stay cold in another. I'm a minimalist, but minimal things aren't always functional. This is!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bento!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Bento! I have another one that isn't nearly as roomy or as reliable. This one Fits more food than I expected so I usually get to share. The utensils are handy and Everyone at work compliments the box every day. The airtight seal is pretty good. I tried opening the lids without unsealing it and I could not get it open. The divider is a little tricky. It fits perfectly in the middle but if you try to slide it more to one side it either gets stuck or doesn't stay at all. It is fine when there is food keeping it from moving though. And the best part! It's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lex Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Doooo cute!!i just got it, have not used it yet, but as soon as this quarantine is over, I am using this. I love the portion control function of this, and the fact that you get a strap to hold it closed. I also appreciate the utensils, so if I want to sit outside to eat my lunch at work, everything is there.
customer_reviews.author: Kibbie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved his bento box! He always forgets his silverware and working outside doesn’t help bc where will you find utensils? But with his bento box he has all the silverware he needs and even chop sticks! He loves that he can separate his food and looks forward to lunch.The lids don’t close all the way but the band definitely help keep them close. It’s microwave safe (we don’t ever let plastic stay in for more than 2 min). He loves how easy it is to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lizette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lunch in a handy box
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great for me and the kids. The wife uses this almost daily to put together meals for us. We've put many different kinds of foods in this and so far, we have not had any trouble. It's holding up to the daily grind just fine. The kids use the silverware and like it, but I prefer my own wooden chopsticks over what they give you. Great for bringing some delicious onigiri and more on long trips!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Emig

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I FABSOLUTELY love it! It's very cute, convenient, and well made. Everything about it is perfect! It came on time, in great condition, and is a very good size. The only complaint I have is with time, since right now is summer and i don't get to use my bento box at school yet. I can't wait to say "Itadakimasu" when i open up my bento box and enjoy my meal! Great product, great company, ARIGATOU!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M S.

customer_reviews.title: I know what I'm getting my friends for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Best food container ever! I always loved Japanese bento boxes, and I never expected to get them of this quality in America. The entire items screams of quality! Even the sharp point of the knife is cut off for safety, and the chopsticks are textured for grip. Amazing!!! Will buy these for my American friends for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: gianini

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice bento and the carrying bag it comes with is really convenient (I'll use it until I find a cuter one). The seals are really snug so you shouldn't have any trouble with leaking with normal food, although I would probably do a test run if you want to use it for liquids. Only complaint is I wish the utensils were secured in their compartment. They're just loose in there and rattle around a bit. Not a big deal but that's the only thing I think could be improved upon!
customer_reviews.author: joanne

customer_reviews.title: Works for me ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday to take lunch to work. Though it seems small it carries plenty and has an adjustable piece to make compartments. I agree that the utensils add no value but use a small salad fork instead (and it fits in the top along with a napkin). I only hand-wash even though it says its dishwasher safe. I don’t put plastic in the dishwasher...period. Came with a carrying bag and the whole thing fits easily in my tote.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Utensils can break easily, container has nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The containers are nice sized, but should have 2 dividers rather than just one. Also, I think there should be some type of sauce container for it as well, to hold sauces in for the food inside the container instead of having to bring a completely different container for it. But other than that, the container quality is nice, hand wash is a bit annoying-but when has it ever not been annoying- but the quality is very nice. The fork did break after a couple months, but other than that it's really great.
customer_reviews.author: karen ochsner

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏿👍🏿👍🏿👍🏿👍🏿👍🏿
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Love it. Great for portion control. Utensils (including chopsticks which are short but manageable) included make this version from the seller beat out other sellers/version. I’ve read other reviews with similar items and chose to keep the lids with the rubber seals out of the microwave when reheating food and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mike

customer_reviews.title: FIND A BETTER OPTION- Bad lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed by this lunchbox. The compartments are difficult to open so there’s a constant risk of sending your food flying! It feels cheaper than I was hoping and the top lid isn’t remotely secure so once you take the band off the cutlery just falls all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Heron

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money - Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bento set!!! Perfect portions, more than enough. Deals extremely well. Comes with the spoon, fork, knife, and chopsticks. Plus the band to hold everything together and a bag you can safety store the hold set in. I love this because it allows me to place the bento bag in my lunchbox then plop it into the fridge when I get to work. Even when I work from home I use it because it is good for keeping your leftovers in general. Definitely get your money’s worth!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rivers

customer_reviews.title: which is great for adults
customer_reviews.text: Cute but not for kids. It's quite difficult to pop open because it's leak proof, which is great for adults. The utensils rumble around the top, it would be nice if they were secure so you don't hear the fork rolling around.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Best One on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: This bento box does everything it ways it does, including being BPA free and totally microwave safe. I tested the leak-proof ability of both boxes with water and not one drop came out of either as I shook them both vigorously for a minute. The little silicone air seal is genius, I highly recommend this product to anyone that wants to take some food from the college dining hall at lunch and it'll still be good by midnight.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Lucarelli

customer_reviews.title: I ended up not using it at all due to the poor quality and left it out in my building for ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels very cheap. It creaking when it’s opened and is difficult to maneuver open and closed. I ended up not using it at all due to the poor quality and left it out in my building for my neighbors to take if they wanted to do so. Two stars because it is a plastic box after all so my expectations weren’t and can’t be amazing, but even given medium expectations, I was disappointed by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Works great but very small
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saw this online and wanted it for her school lunch. We have only used it a couple of times, and I have not tried to put anything in that would need reheating or that would leak. I do find it too small. It will not fit an applesauce or fruit cup, nor will it fit a small apple without being cut into smaller pieces. My daughter loves it but me, not so much as it limits what I can pack for her.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Cute box. Two compartments are nice and good size. The lack of stars comes from the top portion that holds silverware. Without the band across it just falls off. It should have a latch of some sort.
customer_reviews.author: Chark14

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This bento set is wonderful! I love how it all fits together so nicely, it fits in my lunchbox, and it comes with its own cutlery. The only thing I don't like is that the moveable divider doesn't prevent liquids from getting around in the box (e.g. from fruit or veggies), but I can totally live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Klaske

customer_reviews.title: great product, good for lunches.
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for taking lunch to work--anything that doesn't have a lot of liquid. no soup, for instance. but everything from sushi to snack crackers to fruit and nuts to noodle leftovers. very convenient size and shape, much preferable to typical storage containers you find at the store like ziplock or tupperware.
customer_reviews.author: Ixan H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: These have been amazing for meal prep for my kid’s lunch. It feels insane to spend this much on Tupperware for my kids, but it is worth-while. Unlike so many other options, these are high quality; they seal fully (no leaks), are microwave and dishwasher safe, and they don’t have any weird hidden crevices for food to get stuck in.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great Bento box!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bento box. When I first received it, I thought it may be too small, but I’ve changed my mind. The storage capacity works for me. It’s enough for me to include a wrap, cheese stick, berries in one box, with the other box containing carrots and red peppers with hummus, plus my favorite geeen bean dish too. The box is dishwasher safe and easy to clean. The silicon gasket keeps things fresh, and I expect leakproof, although I have yet to add anything with lots of liquids. I used silicon baking cups also purchased on Amazon to provide more dividers for smaller foods or dips like the Hummus.
customer_reviews.author: KADM

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small, compact lunch box but that would fit a lot of food, and this bento box is the perfect match. The only downside is that when it gets greasy, it is a little difficult to clean, but other than that, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This bento is perfect! Very pleased with the presentation and portion size! Nothing has leaked so far. Based on the product description, I was worry about not receiving a bento pouch because I ordered the white color, but I was extremely surprised that I still receive the pouch. Overall, very satisfied with the product! :)
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stylish, and a great size
customer_reviews.text: I just got my bento box. It seems very durable and is a great size for an adult. The only problem I can see is that the chopsticks are veeeery short. They just barely fit in my hand. I do have my own pair, though, so it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I love my Bento
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bento, it has inspired me to be more creative packing my lunch for work, and is a pleasure to use. I have expanded to collecting vintage furoshiki! I wish there was a "middle snap in cover" option that included a built in cold pack that I could pop into the freezer. I do have some small cold packs that I put in the bento, but I don't want to lay them directly on the food. Of course sometimes I put one whole covered Bento layer in the freezer and it thaws out waiting for lunch time, but not all food wants to be that cold.
customer_reviews.author: P. Whempner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bento for lunches
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these and loved it so much that I ordered another one. Great size and seal. I love that it comes with a fork, spoon, knife and chopsticks!
customer_reviews.author: Goddessofcode

customer_reviews.title: Stock standard - But that's not a bad thing
customer_reviews.text: Easy wash n wipe clean, will fit enough food to satisfy even the biggest eaters, and most of all, compact and portable. A great lunchbox from K-9 to 9A-5P.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Wooley

customer_reviews.title: Great for a quick small meal.
customer_reviews.text: Great :) I will have to buy a bigger size next time but it is perfect for a small meal. The one I recieved holds liquid very well. I tested it while I was washing it before use.
customer_reviews.author: Branden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bento box. Ideal for salads, sandwiches, veggies and fruit all in one package. I used muffin wrappers adding my favorite snacks while giving the box some flair. I Got a lot of compliments at the office and have no doubt my colleagues will be buying their own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel & portion control !!!
customer_reviews.text: I received one last year as a gift , I bought a new one to take on plane flights . No problem with TSA , Great way to watch your calorie intake . Love it
customer_reviews.author: John Celestre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect simple lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: Perfect simple lunchbox. If you need an extra little kick to start bringing your own lunch to work this is a great option. The little plastic silverware is a nice touch and all the gaskets make a nice seal, so there is no need to worry about things falling out. I would highly suggest buying a set of silicone baking liners to help separate things (I use it for putting nuts and fruit or a sauce in the same compartment). Great Value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Tipka

customer_reviews.title: Practical and pleasant to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very practical item and rather fun to use. I anticipate that it will hold up for some time and I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JRG

customer_reviews.title: Warning!
customer_reviews.text: Has a slight melt on the inside after microwaving for 1.5mins on a regular microwave. So disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayne A

customer_reviews.title: this is really great box. height is small
customer_reviews.text: this is really great box. height is small, but you can still put everything you need in it. Most importantely, it doesn't leak smell, so it's really great. love smal fork, spon, knife and chopsticks too.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bento box that was purchased for my daughters lunch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bento box that was purchased for my daughters lunch. She was so excited to get one. The company has Great customer service by sending us a thank you for purchasing and seeing if we were satisfied with their product. That does not happen much any more. So yes recommend this quality product to anyone who wants good customer service with quality products. SV
customer_reviews.author: sv

customer_reviews.title: Cool granmarty
customer_reviews.text: Gift surprise to grandkids from college dorm. I felt SOOO cool with your fine quality and appearance and functionality gift!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: rudydot

customer_reviews.title: Not leak proof
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product is not entirely leak proof. If left up right it does a fine job. Also it requires the elastic band to stay together. The compartments fit together well enough but some of the pieces don’t snuggly together or snap in
customer_reviews.author: Sincerely, disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Hate this! Had such a hard time assembling it ...
customer_reviews.text: Hate this ! Had such a hard time assembling it that I just threw it away . such a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Much more room than you think!
customer_reviews.text: My plan when I got this bento box was to do an actual bento lunch for my first day at a new job...and then I was so tired I wound up doing basically an American lunch on a bento box. >_> BUT for anyone curious that's a roll sliced in quarters, cheese, ham, sliced hardboiled egg, cut string cheese in the bottom. And more than enough baby carrots and orange slices up top. I didn't exactly reach my goal of a beautiful bento on my first try but there's definitely plenty of room in there and nothing leaked. EDIT: Updated pic with a nicer lunch. ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Gryph

customer_reviews.title: Useful but has a catch
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other Bentos on Amazon. Just go for the cheapest one. I bought two from different sellers and they were basically identical.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Heng

customer_reviews.title: I have received a lot of compliments on this Bento and for good reason. It’s well made
customer_reviews.text: Normally I don’t write reviews but this product is worth writing about. I use this to bring lunch with me to work and it has been invaluable. I have received a lot of compliments on this Bento and for good reason. It’s well made, plastic, but it’s durable enough. Washing is easy and have the two large compartments are fantastic to split food to be heated and food that can be eaten as is. If I had to buy a bento again, I would buy this one without a hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Macek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lunches!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bento box! I use it when I pack a lot for lunch at work and it has saved me from using so many plastic baggies. I definitely recommend picking up some silicone muffin cups if you want to portion of things like dips or fruit from crackers. I also really love the utensils that were included. I use them pretty often at home even when I don't use the whole box.
customer_reviews.author: Mace

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love our bento boxes!! The only thing I *might* change is that the divider bar doesn't seem to fit quite straight on mine so it leaks a bit if it's not solids (though maybe I'm just putting it in wrong, who knows). Cleaning is easy, just gotta keep track of all the parts 😅 Definitely recommend this, it even fits enough food for my hungry boyfriend!
customer_reviews.author: kylie austin

customer_reviews.title: Great size, but not so perfectly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: One lid doesnt exactly fit the box which makes it not closing perfectly, this is a bummer for leak problems. The top container which has the cutlery section is is just something on top of it, it is not attached or locked in any way so its just a huge pain watch out for that ! Means that as soon as you handle the topmost box, you have to hold it closed or get your cutlery before anything, but still thats not handy.,
customer_reviews.author: Sylvain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lunch and snack container!
customer_reviews.text: Love this box! I am able to carry everything I need and it does not leak. Only thing that would make it better is if it had a second divider for the second box!
customer_reviews.author: Rashida Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Cute lunch box
customer_reviews.text: It's great for taking with me to work. Since I don't like to eat a big lunch, the be to box is cute and functional. The only downside is that the strap that comes with the boxes is easy to lose, and once you lose it, it becomes a little difficult to keep them together. Otherwise, I would fully recommend this bento box to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Small, but does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Dont know if it leaks haven't tried that yet, easy to use pretty self explanatory. It is compact good for kids or if you want to start cutting back on your portion size. Utensils rattle around but I'm not a ninja so dont care how loud it is. I would recommend and buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Mr fox

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bento box
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot for a bento box and the seal works well, although I would not put liquids in it. It's fine for messy, saucy foods though. It easily holds a full sandwich on one layer, with the second layer free for fruit or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: 1903farmhouse

customer_reviews.title: 🤗
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I thought but will having me eating in correct portions so it’ll help me lose some weight
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

customer_reviews.title: A great lunch/bento box!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about two months and it has been utterly fantastic. The lids are tight and though I've had sauce spill in the inside compartments, none of it has leaked out. They are perfectly separated and stack together well. The strap is strong and doesn't go anywhere once it's strapped on. Best yet, it's super easy to clean! I just pop it in the dishwasher every night and it's ready for lunch tomorrow. It doesn't come with any food separators, but I've been using Pantry Elements Silicone Baking Cups in conjunction with this bento and together they work excellently and keep my bento looking cute and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way for transporting my lunch items!  :)
customer_reviews.text: I love my new BentoHeaven Bento box because it is compact, does not leak, has the ideal amount of space for my food items including two compartments, as well as utensils and a bag to carry it all!! It's so easy to clean, and I am just 100% pleased with my purchase. It is also a great value for the price! Highly recommend this to my friends and family - in fact my kids have one now also!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Make sure yours comes with a divider if not email the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Weird but I ordered two and one came with a bad and the other with a divider and I emailed the manufacturer that I would like to have two, no response except weeks later I got a mysterious package of another divider and bag
customer_reviews.author: Raphael

customer_reviews.title: Portable, clean, and simple
customer_reviews.text: I’m always weary when it comes to purchasing things online, especially items that I want to use on a daily bases. It’s harder to tell if something going to last if you’re not going to see until you buy it. But after reading the reviews for other bento boxed I took a chance an chose this one. I have used it since I got which is about 3 weeks ago. I I haven’t had any problems with this. I bought my own chopsticks and have my own utensils but the bag and the container are wonderful. I get tons of complements about my container very often. I definitely would recommend...heck I’ll definitely buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail B.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She loves it! It's a bit smaller than I expected but still plenty of room for a full lunch. Remember to read the directions on how to open it! BentoHeaven sends it in email as well as with the bento box. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amberly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this item it's well worth the price. It looks nice and is still practical. The bag it comes with is super cute, haha. I also really like that it has enough space for the spoons and some sauce packets. Only thing is I wish the two layers would latch together rather having to use the band but I baught it knowing that, that would just be a quality of life upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable, portion controlled!
customer_reviews.text: Love how small and cute it is. It easily fits in my bag it has never leaked which is a plus. Not sure why people say it is har to open I have never had a problem opening it. just let go of the little rubber stopper and it opens easily ! The size is perfect for portion control! planning to buy another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The stretch strap holding the 2 boxes together appeared like it would become stretched out after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bento box but it wasn't what I expected. The 2 boxes itself were okay & it did seem to be leak proof. the plastic utensils seemed a bit cheesy & rattled around within the lid. The stretch strap holding the 2 boxes together appeared like it would become stretched out after a few uses. After the strap becomes stretched out, then how would the boxes be held together?? A velco strap may be better.
customer_reviews.author: BruinBall1

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy design but a little small
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have a sturdy design. Unfortunately for me it’s too small. Never got to use it but the lid to the utensils seemed to open too loosely which could result in them falling out if strap not used. Having a divider in each container would be a pretty awesome feature...just saying :)
customer_reviews.author: KiMi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I honestly see no flaws with the product ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I honestly see no flaws with the product after bringing it to work for a week. I like that it comes with utensils and the ventilation plugs are such a smart move so you don't get that big build up of water on the top if you put hot food in it. I've got a ton of compliments and people asking where i got it at work. Also plenty of space for good sized portions.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan J.

customer_reviews.title: Good bento for portion control and not mixing food.
customer_reviews.text: Wife selected this for me based on the portions needed for lunch in office. I have used this every workday for the past 2 months. Good design, can pack a lot of food, microwave friendly and washing is no problem. Sadly, I can't give it 5 stars as the plastics material on top is chipping off.
customer_reviews.author: Kashif Khan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good size for portion control
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good size for portion control. Bottom of both started to get deformed after several times in the microwave. Wouldn't suggest for hot food.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Subie

customer_reviews.title: The wife loves it and that's all that matters ♥️
customer_reviews.text: Love it it's s little smaller then i thought but besides the it has great seal it feels well built i got it for my wife to replace her old lame boring Tupperware and she's completely in love with her new bento she's always wanted one I give it five 🏅🏅🏅🏅🏅stars all around I definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Robledo

customer_reviews.title: I have other bento boxes but this is my fave!
customer_reviews.text: I work out of my car as a delivery driver, I love this. It fits my lunch and two snacks. It helps me keep my silverware, premeasured food and lunch bag all within arms length without taking up a lot of space. I like that by having it nearby helps me eat home cooked food often. I also love that it’s easliy cleaned in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: d a r d a  lee

customer_reviews.title: Matches description perfectly and is a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I like this bento box a lot. It holds plenty of food for my lunch needs. The cloth bag is also a nice bonus. This also comes with utensils that for easily in the container and are functional. I haven't tried liquids but the way the lids seal it looks like they should be fine. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Opi-Wan Kenopi

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: Goes in the dishwasher without the plastic warping. Also works well in the microwave too. I like that it came with a knife, fork, spoon and chopsticks. Also the elastic band that goes around it is reassuring. Haven't had any spills yet!
customer_reviews.author: Isha J.

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect!!! After using this for over a week, this bento is exactly what I wanted. It is well-made and seals perfectly, but also is super cute and efficient. I absolutely adore it and I have used it daily with zero complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Sprouse

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey for the quality but none the less it is a good quality and definitely worth getting. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi10473

customer_reviews.title: This set works great!! Easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: I pack my lunch daily. This set works great!! Easy to pack, easy to clean. I use a separate lunch bag to carry this. The included utensils are high quality though I usually leave the chopsticks at home.
customer_reviews.author: Ken L

customer_reviews.title: Good way to pack some bento
customer_reviews.text: Good sized bento and comes with chopstick and fork/spoon to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: great quality / just the right size (for lunch)
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of the product. Unless you eat pounds of food for lunch, it is more than enough for a decent size lunch. I've been using bottom section for some sort of carb/protein and top section for salad. No problems so far!
customer_reviews.author: Uzunlar

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily, and have for about a year now. Great deal. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: leroy

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek and nicely designed
customer_reviews.text: The divider is a bit of an odd shape to use in the box and fits a bit strangely. Beautiful, sleek design but would have loved to see some more fun prints. The elastic strap around is extremely handy and I love that it came with the utensils. I will be giving it a go in my hiking backpack soon! Overall beautiful design and worth what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Meg27

product_meta.title: Original BentoHeaven Bento Box Bundle with FREE Lunch Bag, Divider, Utensils, Chopstick & Fun Lunch Box Notes - Leakproof Lunch Boxes - Bamboo Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Bamboo BlackFOOD IS FUN! 

Food can’t always be healthy, but it MUST always be fun!

With the brand new design by BentoHeaven you can enjoy your food no matter where you are! In our premier Bento Style Lunch Boxes you can prepare any kind of food, whether it is cold or warm, and enjoy it when you are out of home! 

READY TO GO?! The silicone sealed lids make sure that our containers are 100% leakproof. The boxes and the lids fit tightly to guarantee that what is inside stays inside!

The air ventilation plug makes sure your food stays fresh in the box, and helps to reduce the heating time!

THERE IS EVEN MORE! In addition to the cutlery set you will also receive a pair of chopsticks. Depending on the type of food you prepare in your lunch box, you can freely decide which suits you the best! Next to that there is still room for a napkin, which makes out a whole mobile tableware.

QUALITY MATERIALS All of our products are guaranteed BPA Free and non-toxic. Your safety is important to us, and we only want to offer the very best for our customers.

BUY THE BENTOHEAVEN BENTO LUNCH BOX BY CLICKING THE “ADD TO CART” BUTTON NOW!
feature_bullets: GET THE MOST STYLISH BENTO LUNCH BOX: Friends, family, colleagues will be longing for your lunch box by BentoHeaven from the first moment they see it. Fresh, functional and modern design, rooted in minimalist Japanese lunch box traditions.

EAT SAFE HEALTHY MEALS ANYWHERE: reusable, airtight, leak proof bento box containers made of food grade BPA-FREE materials keep your meals fresh and mess free by preventing any spills leaks or smells in your bag. Great bento box ideas for lunch box portion control and special diet by keeping food separated.

GIVE THE BEST MOMENTS OF THEIR DAY: use your FREE lunch box notes to send a personal message to your beloved ones! Print and place your note into their lunch boxes. Guaranteed fun with bento boxes for adults and for kids!

USE AND CLEAN WITH EASE: Bento boxes are durable, microwave, dishwasher and freezer safe. Silicone sealed lids and ventilation caps allow shorter heating times. Easy to clean due to the super smooth inner surface.

BUY IT FROM BENTOHEAVEN: SET INCLUDES: 2x20 fl. oz food containers with ventilated lids top cover elastic strap, one food divider FREE pair of chopsticks, cutlery set: fork knife spoon FREE lunch bag FREE Cheer Up lunch box notes. Comes in 2 color variations: Bamboo Black and Bamboo White.
